DataElement.preferredName: Patient Quality of Life Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Vendor Consent Patient Consent Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, has given permission for questions concerning Quality of Life using the Radiation Therapy Oncology Group's (RTOG), a multi-institutional cooperative organization comprised of 250 of the major research institutions nationally and in Canada, funded by NCI, quality of life data capture system.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Quality of Life Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Vendor Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, giving permission for questions concerning Quality of Life using the Radiation Therapy Oncology Group's (RTOG), a multi-institutional cooperative organization comprised of 250 of the major research institutions nationally and in Canada, funded by NCI, quality of life data capture system.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Quality of Life Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Vendor Consent
Property.preferredDefinition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.:The Radiation Therapy Oncology Group (RTOG) is a multi-institutional cooperative organization, a national cancer study research group comprised of 250 of the major research institutions nationally and in Canada, funded by NCI, headquartered in Philadelphia with almost 30 years of experience in running clinical trials. More than 40 clinical trials that involve radiation therapy either alone or in conjunction with surgery and/or chemotherapeutic drugs are active at any one time within RTOG. The group is interested in quality of life issues and their effects on the cancer patient:A person or agency that promotes or exchanges goods or services for money; a seller.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

A multi-institutional cooperative organization, a national cancer study research group comprised of 250 of the major research institutions nationally and in Canada, funded by NCI, headquartered in Philadelphia with almost 30 years of experience in running clinical trials. More than 40 clinical trials that involve radiation therapy either alone or in conjunction with surgery and/or chemotherapeutic drugs are active at any one time within RTOG. The group is interested in quality of life issues and their effects on the cancer patient
A person or agency that promotes or exchanges goods or services for money; a seller.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
